name: Wall
description: It's a wall. It divides the room.

name: Cheap Futon
description: A cheap futon. You can sleep in it, but you won't like it.

name: Cheap Toilet
description: It's a toilet. It's cheap. What more do you want?

name: Cheap Kotatsu
description: A cheap kotatsu. It might burn you, but at least its warm in the winter.

name: Nice Futon
description: A nice futon for a nice rest.

name: Ultimate Down Futon
description: Every feather in the Ultimate Down Futon was hand plucked by a Duck Expert for maximum softness, volume, and color.

name: Nice Toilet
description: A substantial upgrade from a cheap toilet. Be the you you want to be.

name: Excellent Toilet
description: An excellent toilet. Comes with all the add-ons you'd expect from a 20,000 yen toilet.

name: New Rest ARDH
description: The ARDH improves significantly on previous models, its memory foam exterior ensures the perfect fit for every body shape. Bidet-included.

name: New Rest ARDX Super
description: The ARDX Super is the latest in toilet technology. Shaped like a stasis pod, you'll forget what you were even doing in the first place.

name: Cheap Kitchen
description: A cheap kitchen area that allows for heating instant ramen and water for tea.

name: Cheap Kitchen Wide
description: A wider cheap kitchen area that allows for heating instant ramen and water for tea, as well as some counter space.

name: Standard Grade Kitchen
description: A kitchen of standard quality. Not too great, not too bad.

name: Standard Grade Kitchen x 3
description: A kitchen of standard quality, but 50% wider!

name: High Grade Kitchen
description: A high grade kitchen. Please don't ask what qualifies as high grade because we don't know either.

name: High Grade Kitchen x 4
description: A high grade kitchen, with extra width for when you really need it.

name: Super High Grade Kitchen
description: A super high grade kitchen area. You can feel the quality eminating from its glowing countertops.

name: Super High Grade Kitchen x 4
description: A super high grade kitchen, but with more width, to accomodate your massive house.

name: Ultra Grade Kitchen
description: An ultra grade kitchen. Who knew there was a level even beyond super high grade?

name: Home Computer for the Thrifty Spender
description: A cheap computer that enables you to do some work from home. 5% of your time at home contributes to time at work.

name: Modern Home PC Setup
description: A decent computer that allows for some from home. 10% of your time at home contributes to time at work.

name: Extreme PC for Real Salarymen
description: A monstrous computer that allows for easy working from home. 22.5% of your time at home contributes to time at work.

name: Cheap Bathtub
description: A small, likely moldy tub, in a musky salmon color that ensures quick and unpleasant baths.

name: Half Bath
description: A very small tub that fits conveniently anywhere in a house.

name: Polyethylene Bathtub
description: A standard tub found in many houses in Japan.

name: Excellent Bathtub
description: A tub for someone above average. Prove your worth to your guests when they glance a peek at your slightly superstandard bathtub.

name: Spacious Apartment Bathtub
description: A tub as large as can be in a 2x1 meter space. Comfortable and luxurious. It'll make you forget how small your tiny apartment really is.

name: Magic Bottle Bathtub
description: An extra large bathtub.It's not actually magic, but it will feel like it. It's not a bottle either, please understand.

name: First Class Bathroom Suite
description: A bathroom for rich people. Spacious, overdesigned, and extravagant. Enjoy your wealth from the comfort of your bathtub.
